page.title: 12SCHOOLS
page.content: PRIMARY:The primary school holds children from the age of 5 to 11.The school has good variety of things to do .The children do swimming, clay work, painting etc.The children have a set amount of work at the begining of the week.There are 3 wings,2 year age groups to each wing.The children are in bays a teacher to 1 bay.The bays vary to each wing.The school holds 350 children.First thing in the morning at 9.00 a.m the teacher registers in the children.This is also done at 1.30pm.after this is completed in the morning the children go into assembly (sometimes this happens in the afternoon).The teachers hold "bay times",where they discuss work or read.
